purpose: The email announces the 9th International Conference on Information Technology & Systems (ICITS'26) to be held in Roatán Island, Honduras, from February 16 to 18, 2026. It invites researchers and practitioners to submit original papers in English, Spanish, or Portuguese on various topics related to Information Technology & Systems. The email outlines submission guidelines, including formatting requirements, review processes, and publication details. Important dates for paper submission, notification of acceptance, and registration are also provided.

conf_name_candidates.raw: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems
conf_name_candidates.evidence: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems

evidence_sentences: ICITS'26 - 9th Int. Conference on Information Technology & Systems
We are pleased to invite you to submit your original papers to ICITS'26.
Submitted papers should be related with one or more of the main themes proposed for the Conference.
All submissions will be reviewed on the basis of relevance, originality, importance and clarity.
Papers written in English and accepted and registered will be published in Proceedings by Springer.
Payment of Registration, to ensure the inclusion of an accepted paper in the conference proceedings: November 19, 2025.
